column2:
"After Luther had kidnapped Harriet and
ran away, the Guardian was hot on his trail."

"A Devil Castle had cropped up near the
canyonside bordering Cuent."

"Luther had created this Devil Castle.
It was proof enough that Luther was
no longer himself."

"Slowly approaching the looming Devil Castle,
<%me> finds themselves staring
down a familiar enemy."

"Devil Castle confirmed!
Seems like [Loser]'s Darkers are here as well."
"There is no mistake, that is the Devil Castle that Luther set up."
"We can't leave this alone, there might be clues left behind. Let's destroy it."
